details.access_and_opening_times:
Opening hours

Monday to Friday, 9am to 5pm

Consular section

The Consular Section is open Monday to Friday 0930 to 1230 by appointment only except in an emergency. For Notarial, documentary and other non-urgent consular services appointments should be made online via our official website: www.consular-appointments.service.gov.uk For general Consular enquiries please contact: Consular.Yerevan@fco.gov.uk If you require emergency Consular assistance out of office hours please call +37410 264301 and choose the option for an emergency involving a British National.

Disabled access is available. Customers should contact the British Embassy Yerevan in advance of their appointment for assistance.

2016 public holidays

  • Friday 01 January New Year’s Day
  • Wednesday 6 January Christmas Day
  • Tuesday 08 March International Women’s Day
  • Friday 25 March Good Friday
  • Monday 28 March Easter Monday
  • Friday 22 April In lieu of Sunday 24 April Genocide Memorial Day
  • Monday 02 May Early May Bank Holiday
  • Monday 09 May Victory Day
  • Friday 27 May In lieu of Saturday 28 May Republic Day
  • Monday 30 May Spring Bank Holiday
  • Tuesday 5 July Constitution Day
  • Wednesday 21 September Independence Day
  • Monday 26 December Boxing Day
  • Monday 30 December In lieu of Saturday 31 December New Year’s Eve
